attributes.action: action the petition by requesting that MPs who have sold properties during the property boom years complete a questionaire stating the circumstances surrounding the sale, to ensure that they were consistent in whether home was delegated 1st, 2nd, 3rd etc when capital gains tax due was an issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great concern that ministers make laws for the rest of us that they do not heed themselves. That they should pay capital gains tax on properties sold for huge profits during the property boom years, where they have changed the status of that dwelling for the purposes of avoiding paying the tax and that this ruling should be retrospective.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
